cloudInitConfigDrive.userData:
#cloud-config
package_update: true
packages:
  - wget
hostname: elastictest-tyler
users:
  - name: tyler
    gecos: tyler
    expiredate: '2032-09-01'
    lock_passwd: false
    passwd: $6$rounds=4096$Vd8W45YhfEELz1sq$HVp7eLIeJM.XOmN8o.RAwrg1UsqKpAXZBClx6uSX46j5Jwe4HN7cPdPYaKDLUVKYcAvjGTyRP3w26OrIo/.HD1
runcmd:
  - [ mkdir, /home/elastic ]
  - [ wget, "https://artifacts.elastic.co/downloads/beats/elastic-agent/elastic-agent-8.1.2-linux-x86_64.tar.gz", -O, /home/elastic/agent.tar.gz ]
  - [ tar, -xvf, /home/elastic/agent.tar.gz, -C, /home/elastic/ ]
  - [ ./home/elastic/elastic-agent-8.1.2-linux-x86_64/elastic-agent, install, "-f","--url=https://fleet.rellis.dev", "--enrollment-token=NU0zdDUzOEJZWmJDWDF5QndxTXI6VEpkTXI1LWpRcVN0RTdCRUVMTml5Zw==", "--insecure" ]
  - ["touch", "/etc/cloud/cloud-init.disabled"]
